text: Hi, how can I ask HubDB acces to portal 2761484?
I could be wrong but I think hubDB comes with HS Sites, so if you have the sites feature  on the account you already have access

All of the projects I work on have it. 

The link to get at your hubDBs is under website pages - then there’s a more link, on the lefthand side of that page what has a dropdown with HubDB.

HS is also rolling out a new main nav bar which I think includes a link to it. I haven’t gotten to use the new nav anywhere yet so I’m not certain.
New nav doesnt have direct link. Still sits under the more tools link.
:disappointed:  I gotta added that link to the bookmarklet, been putting it off because i thought the new nav would have it.

The basic HS CMS package does not include it (at least it didn't use to). I have a few clients on the lowest package and they do not have HubDB access. However, just took a look at the pricing page and now I'm only seeing one website addon, which I would assume includes it.
Yea, im pretty disappointed in the new nav. While I like the relabeling of things, I still dont know why they dont have a development menu and just have design manager, hubdb, menus and more under it

There are two levels of the Website add-on:
Website Starter ($100/mo) which has a 3,000 visit limit and *does not* include HubDB.
Website ($300/mo) which has unlimited visitors and does include HubDB.
Thanks Jeff, thought that was the case, but couldn't find any info on the Starter when I looked

floated this idea - <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C26E7JT8V/p1525879867000554>

Hopefully someone will bite
Thanks all for the help, just going to check which version has the client purchased
